content:
<trent_vanepps> > <trent_vanepps>  is there someone in your PSE crew that would be a good fit/ is interested in taking #3 on? (re @Barrywhitehat: My takeaways are 

1. Lets schadual the audit with gorth16 power of tau as an indication of how much work it will be , but we have not decided to use that. 
2. Lets find a way to review Kev's (https://hackmd.io/@6iQDuIePQjyYBqDChYw_jg/Bk6sERCH9) proposal and see if that is better for our needs rather than the groth16 based one 
3. Lets try and find someone to take the lead on "Anaysis of trusted setup attack vectors" as their full time focus)
